author: nftdao
title: NFT-DAO Boxcar Framework Contracts
description: Writing safe DApp smart contracts today is difficult and developers lack the tools to ensure auditable smart contracts.
solution: By partnering with MuKn.io/Glow we are making the building of infrastructure contracts fast, easy to write, and audit to onboard developers.
experience: MuKn.io/Glow brings skills in cybersecurity, cryptography, distributed systems, systems programming, economic modeling & mechanism design.
